actor "Administrator" as a
title 02-delete_event_administrator_basic
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as wb
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_> DispatchServlet" as ds
entity "<link:_> model:Model" as mm
control "<link:_>: EventSystem" as ec
participant "<link:_>: EventService" as es
participant "<link:_>: EventRepository" as er
entity "<link:_>event : Event" as e



==1. The administrator perfroms the  view all events use case **(01-view_all_events)**\n2. The administrator selects view_event_history use case **(20-view_events_history)**.==

note over a,es: This is done using javascript so it does not need to be shown here

==3. The administrator selectes the delete functionality of corresponding event==

note over a,es: This is done using javascript so it does not need to be shown here

==4. The system asks the administrator to confirm(03-delete_event)\n5.The administrator selects **Yes**==

a->wb: interact
activate wb

wb->ds:POST(url:String, payload:json)
activate ds

ds->ec:deleteEvent(eventID:long, m: Model)
activate ec

ec->es: getEvent(eventID:long)
activate es

es->er:e:=findByName(eventID:long)


es-->ec:return e
deactivate es
ec->es: deleteEvent(e: Event)
activate es
es->e:<<destory>>
destroy e
es-->ec:
deactivate es
ec-->es: getEvents()
activate es
  es->er:findAll()
es-->ec: return allEvents
deactivate es


ec->mm:addAttributes("events": String, allEvents: Event[*])

ec-->ds:return "view_events_history"

ds ->*nv:View(model:Model)
activate nv

nv-->ds:
deactivate nv

ds-->wb:return newView


==4. The system returns to the view events history page (20-view_events_history.png) and the venue is no longer displayed==
